participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and compassionate, with a deep love for nature and animals. She is creative and enjoys expressing herself through art.
participant_1.background: I like to go on walks with my dog, because he's always excited to explore. My favorite type of music is country. I like doing art projects. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job isn't very personally fulfilling. I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and nurturing, with a strong sense of responsibility towards both animals and family. He enjoys sharing his knowledge and experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I enjoy playing with my cat Seven of Nine. I would love to cook a big meatloaf to feed my family. I am a zookeeper. I am married with 5 kids. Running is a hobby.

content.text: What kind of activism do you do?
I work as a zookeeper. I try to advocate for the rights of animals and educate the public on their needs.
I love animals! My dog is a big part of my life. What kind of animals do you work with?
I work with many different animals at the zoo, including elephants, tigers, lions, and bears. I also have a pet cat at home.
Wow! That sounds like an amazing job. I love learning about animals. What's your favorite animal?
It's hard to choose just one favorite animal, but I'd have to say elephants. They're such amazing, intelligent creatures.
I agree! I think elephants are so beautiful and graceful. Do you have any interesting stories about your work with elephants?
One of my favorite memories is when I was able to interact with an elephant up close. I was able to feed her and pet her, and she was so gentle and loving. It was an incredible experience.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to have the opportunity to interact with an elephant one day.
It's definitely an experience you'll never forget
